item.title: FT Most Read: Wednesday, March 26, 2025 at 2:55 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Retail traders plough $67bn into US stocks while investment giants flee
2. [Opinion] A white-collar world without juniors?
3. [Opinion] British Airways tries to regain its halo with a new first-class seat
4. Top US officials shared classified details of military strikes with journalist
5. US agrees maritime ceasefire deal with Ukraine and Russia
